item.title: 中国人形机器人在美国顶级科技展上随处可见
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克的担忧在本周拉斯维加斯消费电子展上得以充分展现。展厅内随处可见中国制造的人形机器人，它们或打乒乓球、或扫地清扫，甚至练习功夫。【原文：One of Elon Musk’s worries was on full display at CES in Las Vegas this week. Chinese-made human-like robots were everywhere across the exhibition floor, playing table tennis, sweeping floors and practicing kung fu.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示美国通胀预期与就业前景恶化
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的月度调查显示，去年12月美国通胀预期上升，而就业机会的感知程度则创下至少12.5年来的最低水平。【原文：US inflation expectations rose in December while perceptions of job availability were the worst in at least 12.5 years, according to a monthly survey from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 美国计划控制委内瑞拉石油，非洲信贷市场受冲击
item.description: 非洲美元债券的反弹势头正遭遇阻碍，因美国计划长期增加委内瑞拉原油进口，削弱了非洲石油出口国债券的吸引力。【原文：A rally in Africa’s dollar bonds is stumbling as long-term US plans to boost crude from Venezuela dim the appeal of debt from oil exporters on the continent.】

item.title: 网络攻击为何日益猖獗？我们能采取哪些措施？
item.description: 网络犯罪看似逐年加剧的一个原因在于，黑客不断调整战术，并狡黠地采用新技术。加密货币和勒索软件就是如此，如今人工智能领域也正上演着同样的戏码。【原文：One reason cybercrime appears to get worse every year is because hackers continually shift their tactics and cannily adopt new technologies. It happened with cryptocurrencies and the malicious code known as ransomware. Now it’s happening with artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 英国工党领袖斯塔默威胁对马斯克旗下X平台采取行动，因其涉及儿童图像问题
item.description: 英国首相基尔·斯塔默誓言采取行动，并要求埃隆·马斯克旗下的X平台紧急"整顿"其人工智能工具Grok生成的儿童色情图像问题。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer vowed action and demanded Elon Musk’s X urgently “get their act together” over sexualized images of children produced by its artificial intelligence tool Grok.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯采取行动遏制阿联酋，也门问题暴露两国竞争关系
item.description: 随着沙特阿拉伯与阿联酋这两个海湾强国之间长期存在的竞争关系日益紧张，沙特正着手终结阿联酋在也门的角色，并削弱其邻国在包括红海在内的其他领域的势力范围。【原文：Saudi Arabia is moving to end the role of the United Arab Emirates in Yemen and diminish its neighbor’s influence in other arenas, including the Red Sea, as tensions rise in the longstanding rivalry between the two Gulf powerhouses.】

item.title: 意大利国防开支不会削减社会支出，乔尔杰蒂表示
item.description: 意大利财政部长詹卡洛·焦尔杰蒂表示，该国承诺将国防开支提升至北约目标水平，但此举不会影响其社会安全网体系。【原文：Italy’s promise to raise defense spending to meet NATO targets will not impact the country’s social safety net, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: Advent正与InPost首席执行官、PPF商谈合作收购事宜
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募股权公司Advent正与InPost SA创始人及捷克投资公司PPF集团洽谈合作，拟共同收购这家在阿姆斯特丹上市的物流公司。【原文：Buyout firm Advent is in talks to team up with InPost SA’s founder and Czech investment firm PPF Group NV on a potential buyout of the Amsterdam-listed logistics company, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 标普500指数自历史高点持续回落 防务类股大幅攀升
item.description: 周四美国股市下跌，交易员们在评估美国经济释放的矛盾信号时降低了风险敞口。特朗普总统计划大幅增加美国军费开支，提振了全球国防类股。【原文：US stocks fell on Thursday, with traders dialing back risk as they assess mixed signals on the US economy. President Donald Trump’s plans to ratchet up the US military budget buoyed defense stocks around the world.】

item.title: 字母表公司超越苹果，规模仅次于英伟达位列第二
item.description: Alphabet公司已超越苹果公司，成为市值第二高的企业，这反映出谷歌母公司如何成为人工智能领域最重要的赢家之一。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has overtaken Apple Inc. to become the second-most valuable company by market capitalization, a reflection of how the Google parent has emerged as one of the most significant winners of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 乌克兰12月粮食出口量骤降，因罢工活动加剧
item.description: 乌克兰作为全球主要粮食出口国之一，其小麦出口量在12月骤降近25%，原因是俄罗斯加剧了对该国港口基础设施的袭击，这些港口是其主要出口通道。【原文：Wheat exports from Ukraine — one of the world’s major grain exporters — tumbled almost 25% in December as Russia stepped up attacks on the country’s port infrastructure that serves as its main export conduit.】

item.title: 康菲石油与埃克森美孚考虑委内瑞拉新局势，美能源高管称马杜罗下台后将重新评估在该国角色
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯·赖特在与高管会谈后表示，康菲石油公司、埃克森美孚公司及其他美国石油公司正在探讨如何助力委内瑞拉能源产业振兴。【原文：ConocoPhillips, Exxon Mobil Corp. and other US oil companies are examining what role they can play in helping revitalize Venezuela’s energy industry, US Energy Secretary Chris Wright said following talks with executives.】

item.title: 贝森特称美联储不应推迟降息，CNBC报道
item.description: 财政部长斯科特·贝森特呼吁美联储继续降息，延续了他对美国货币政策制定者的施压行动。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called for the Federal Reserve to continue cutting interest rates, extending his pressure campaign on US monetary policymakers.】

item.title: 保险公司收购Erste SRT交易，该交易与100亿欧元并购贷款挂钩
item.description: 奥地利银行Erste Group Bank AG出售了一项重大风险转移业务，涉及超过100亿欧元（117亿美元）的贷款，该行正试图为其史上最大规模的收购案释放资本。【原文：Erste Group Bank AG sold a significant risk transfer linked to more than €10 billion ($11.7 billion) of loans as the Austrian bank seeks to free up capital for its largest ever acquisition.】

item.title: 监管机构称马斯克旗下Grok公司涉嫌制作非法图像
item.description: 英国负责向执法机构分类和标记网络儿童性虐待材料的监管机构表示，其在暗网发现据称由Grok生成的"犯罪"图像。该人工智能工具与埃隆·马斯克旗下的X平台相关联。【原文：The UK watchdog responsible for classifying and flagging online child sexual abuse material to law enforcement agencies said it found “criminal” images on the dark web allegedly generated by Grok, the artificial intelligence tool tied to Elon Musk’s X.】

item.title: 加纳与债券持有人就担保债务达成重组协议
item.description: 加纳与一组债券持有人就重组2026年到期违约美元债券达成原则性协议，标志着该国解决与国际债权人纠纷的进程取得关键进展。【原文：Ghana and a group of bondholders have reached an agreement in principle to restructure a defaulted 2026 dollar bond, marking a key step in the country’s ongoing effort to resolve disputes with international creditors.】

item.title: 央行官员称23%的工资涨幅强化了哥伦比亚加息的理由
item.description: 哥伦比亚央行一位高级官员表示，该国创纪录的最低工资涨幅构成重大通胀冲击，这为提高利率提供了有力依据。【原文：Colombia’s record minimum wage increase is a significant inflation shock that bolsters the case for higher interest rates, according to a senior central banker.】

item.title: Qube旗下主要对冲基金去年涨幅达30%，Torus基金收益达20%
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Qube Research & Technologies旗下主要对冲基金去年涨幅约为30%，与该基金的长期平均业绩持平。【原文：Qube Research & Technologies’ main hedge fund gained about 30% last year, in line with its long-term average performance, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国生产率增速创两年新高
item.description: 美国第三季度劳动生产率增速升至两年最高水平，进一步印证了效率提升正在抑制工资带来的通胀压力。【原文：US labor productivity accelerated in the third quarter to the strongest pace in two years, adding to evidence that efficiency gains are suppressing inflationary pressures from wages.】

item.title: 美国贸易逆差因进口下降缩小至2009年以来最低水平
item.description: 美国10月贸易逆差意外收窄，降至2009年以来最低水平，主要因进口大幅回落。【原文：The US trade deficit unexpectedly narrowed in October to the smallest since 2009 on a sharp pullback in imports.】

item.title: 美联储经济学家米兰主张2026年降息150个基点以提振就业
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，他希望今年能降息150个基点以提振劳动力市场。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said he is looking for 150 basis points of interest-rate cuts this year to boost the labor market.】

item.title: 关税将加拿大对美出口份额推至疫情外历史最低点
item.description: 加拿大商品贸易收支再度出现赤字，原因是计算机和电子产品进口额超过了对非美国国家黄金出口的激增。【原文：Canada’s merchandise trade balance swung back into deficit as imports of computers and electronics outweighed a spike in gold exports to non-US countries.】

item.title: 市场策略师诺德维格出售公司，将加入合并实体
item.description: 金融市场资深人士延斯·诺德维格——其职业生涯中长期位居顶尖货币策略师之列——宣布将Exante Data Inc.出售给研究公司Vanda，并将在合并后担任新公司总裁。【原文：Financial markets veteran Jens Nordvig — a top-ranked currency strategist for much of his career — is selling Exante Data Inc. to research firm Vanda and will become president of the combined company, he said.】

item.title: 英国政府要求各部门节省开支以资助身份证计划
item.description: 英国政府要求各部委削减部门开支，以筹措资金推行一项备受争议的新数字身份证计划。【原文：The UK government has asked ministers to find reductions in their departmental spending in order to fund a controversial new digital ID program.】

item.title: 美国炼油商成为特朗普委内瑞拉计划的早期赢家
item.description: 本周，美国部分最大石油加工企业的股价大幅上涨。【原文：Shares of some of the largest American oil processors have surged this week.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行降息后通胀降幅超预期
item.description: 墨西哥12月年度通胀率降幅超出预期，这为政策制定者在最近一次会议上决定下调基准利率提供了支撑。【原文：Mexican annual inflation slowed more than expected in December, supporting policymakers’ decisions to cut their benchmark interest rate at their last meeting.】

item.title: 国防类股再度飙升，特朗普计划增加军事预算
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普计划要求增加美国军事预算，这为全球国防类股票注入了新的动力，欧洲国防股在这一年伊始表现尤为强劲，而今年似乎将由地缘政治主导。【原文：President Donald Trump’s plans to request an increase in the US military budget is giving a fresh boost to defense stocks around the world, with those in Europe having a particularly strong start to a year that looks set to be dominated by geopolitics.】

item.title: 肥胖症、并购、生物技术复兴：2026年健康股投资指南
item.description: 美国股市的医疗保健板块历来被视为防御性板块，这得益于该行业支柱企业稳定的增长和健康的股息收益率。但这种认知正在改变。【原文：The health-care corner of the US equity market has traditionally been viewed as defensive, thanks to steady growth and healthy dividend yields among the industry’s stalwarts. That narrative is changing.】

item.title: TikTok风波悄然走向低调结局
item.description: 欢迎阅读《科技深度》——彭博社全球记者团队每日为您带来的科技商业资讯。今日，亚历山德拉·S·莱文报道称，随着TikTok被出售给美国投资者，美国禁止该应用的努力似乎已告终结。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Alexandra S. Levine reports on what appears to be the end of the effort to ban TikTok in the US with a sale to American investors.】

item.title: 新兴市场股票与货币下跌，地缘政治风险加剧
item.description: 新兴市场股票和货币连续第二日下跌，因地缘政治风险上升令交易员在关键美国就业数据公布前保持谨慎。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies fell for a second day as rising geopolitical risks turned traders cautious a day before key US jobs data.】
